guide.name: Report of passenger list(Call up)
guide.item: Người dùng nhập số tham chiếu hành khách để gọi thông tin hành khách đã khai báo. Số tham chiếu tối đa 12 ký tự

1. In case of calling up for correction - It is required to enter Volume No. (1 or 2) to be called up. - It is required to call up the first volume at first. After correct the first volume, call up the second volume. 2. In case of calling up for cancellation - It is not available to enter Volume No. - Both the first volume and the second volume will be cancelled in PLR service regardless of entered-Volume No.
